llm_command:
kubectl apply -f - <<EOF
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: adservice-policy
  namespace: adservice
spec:
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      app: adservice
  ingress:
    - from:
        - podSelector:
            matchLabels:
              app: frontend
        - podSelector:
            matchLabels:
              app: recommendation
      ports:
        - protocol: TCP
          port: 9555
EOF
